title: Sound modifications
description: Use this field to modify sound effects, for example adjust the pitch.

pitch.description: Set the pitch directly, value should be > 0, default 1 (lower = lower tone)

semitone.description: Adjust the pitch in semitones, values should be between -14 and 14, default 0

octaves.description: Adjust the pitch in octaves, values should be between -1 and 1, default 0

track.description: The track to which the sound modifications will be applied. Accepted values are `inbound` or `outbound`
